argumentation_categories.description: Subtle tactics to push for ethical change within existing corporate structures
example_tactics: Delaying an unethical project by requesting more user testing
Suggesting alternative approaches that are more ethical

argumentation_categories.description: Logical, emotional, and credibility-based persuasion methods to convince stakeholders
example_tactics: Using empirical evidence to show business risks
Appealing to company values and reputation
Presenting case studies of similar ethical decisions

argumentation_categories.description: Embedding ethical concerns into structured processes like compliance and design reviews
example_tactics: Integrating ethical checkpoints in development workflow
Using compliance requirements to enforce ethical standards

argumentation_categories.description: More explicit, riskier tactics where a person directly challenges unethical decisions
example_tactics: Writing open letters against unethical deployments

ethical_valence_scoring.justification: Minimal action that documents concerns but doesn't actively resist
